```{r hey, echo = F}
library(flair)
```

```{r how_to_pipe, include = FALSE}
iris %>%
  group_by(Species) %>%
  summarize(mean(Sepal.Length))
```

```{r ho, echo = FALSE}
decorate("how_to_pipe") %>% 
  flair("%>%")
```

---

```{r plot, include=F}
ggplot(cars) +
  aes(x = speed) +
  aes(y = dist) +
  geom_point() +
  aes(size = speed) +
  aes(color = dist) +
  scale_color_viridis_c()
```

```{r hum, fig.height=3, echo = F}
decorate("plot") %>% 
  flair_funs()
```
